title: Lily detail page engagement row placement fix

requirements.summary: Ensure the Lily detail page engagement row (likes/replies/views) always renders directly below the main content block (title + description, then image/link if present), without affecting any other pages/components.
acceptanceCriteria: On the lily detail page, when a lily has an image, the likes/replies/views row appears below the image and below the description text (it is not shown above the image).
On the lily detail page, when a lily has no image, the likes/replies/views row still appears below the description (or below the title if there is no description).
The likes/replies/views row styling and functionality (like toggle, counts formatting) remain unchanged aside from its placement.
No layout/placement changes are made to the engagement row in frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx or other pages.

file_operations.description: Move the existing engagement/action bar block (likes/replies/views with like toggle and formatted counts) out of the header/title area and render it after the optional image block and optional link block, ensuring it always appears directly below the lily’s main content (title/description → image/link → engagement row) while keeping styling and behavior unchanged.
